mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (ID, NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=DATE})
